channel.title: Ancients not working 100%?
channel.description: Can anyone point me to a guide or explain how to make sure that when you're frozen, you can't move or click anything further than 1 space away to tele etc. I tried copying the magichandler.java and .class but it didn't work either :S

item.title: Ancients not working 100%?
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

I checked client.java and magichandler.java and they both said something similar to what you said but look for yourself they are both set-

} if ((spellID == 1572) || (spellID == 1582) || (spellID == 1592) || (spellID == 12861) || (spellID == 12881) || (spellID == 12871) || (spellID == 12891)) { // Fixed // bakatool // added // all // freeze // spells. itFreezes = true; } else { itFreezes = false;
